thread.title: North Carolina attorney general kicks off run for governor
thread.title_full: North Carolina attorney general kicks off run for governor

title: North Carolina attorney general kicks off run for governor
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest North Carolina attorney general kicks off run for governor Democratic Attorney General Roy Cooper has kicked off his bid to become North Carolina governor and unseat Republican incumbent Pat McCrory. Post to Facebook North Carolina attorney general kicks off run for governor Democratic Attorney General Roy Cooper has kicked off his bid to become North Carolina governor and unseat Republican incumbent Pat McCrory.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/politics/elections/2015/10/12/north-carolina-attorney-general-kicks-off-run-for-governor/73842822/   North Carolina attorney general kicks off run for governor Associated Press, AP 6:55 p.m. EDT October 12, 2015 North Carolina Attorney General, Roy Cooper, spoke to Mecklenburg County Democrats on Wednesday, September 10, 2014. (Photo: NBC Charlotte) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ROCKY MOUNT, N.C. (AP) - Democratic Attorney General Roy Cooper has kicked off his bid to become North Carolina governor and unseat Republican incumbent Pat McCrory. 
Cooper formally announced his bid Monday evening to a crowd of party luminaries, interest group leaders and friends and family in Nash County, where he grew up and began his law practice. 
Cooper has been talking about planning for a bid for governor since 2013 and has been critical of policies pushed by the Republican-led General Assembly and McCrory. 
Cooper told supporters that people in charge in Raleigh are leading North Carolina down the wrong path. He says that North Carolina can lead the South again. 
Ken Spaulding of Durham already has announced he's seeking the Democratic gubernatorial nomination. Their primary would be March 15.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/politics/elections/2015/10/12/north-carolina-attorney-general-kicks-off-run-for-governor/73842822/ TOP VIDEOS
